Nat Carey

Nat Carey (she/her)

Musician, Comedian, Software Engineer

Hi, I'm Nat

I'm Nat, I have too many hobbies. I'll share some of them here but there are always more.

Comedy

I perform queer, feminist comedy. I've heard many many (male) commedians say "You can't joke about anything anymore". I joke about all sorts of things - sexuality, gender pay gap, parenting, sexuality. I call on my own experiences with each of these things and try to make some oignant points alongside/through the jokes.

Music

I've been playing music since I was 10, it's been so important to me for much of this time. I play drums, guitar, bass, I dabble on keys and vocals. Mostly at the moment I'm producing. I have produced one album and I'm working on more.
